Review Title: This is a place you will return to year upon year - so special
Review Text: This is our second time at Sport Hermitage. And we think we will now come back every year. There are many things I could say about this amazing hotel - the comfortable beds, the amazing housekeeping staff, the incredible sushi and patatas bravas, the perfect location next to the lift and of course the view. But I have a story to tell you about this hotel that will explain how truly exceptional it is. Yesterday we watched as our home in the UK was broken into and we saw via our internal cameras 3 masked men trash our home. We were inconsolable. After 3 hours on the phone to the police we went to the bar for alcohol as we really were devastated. We ordered a lot of drinks in the next few hours as we told the staff why we were so upset. When we finally went to leave and to sign the check the staff refused to charge us a penny. What more can I say about this team ? This is the kind of service that makes you want to be a loyal customer- it was a small light on a dark day and we will never ever forget their kindness. These are truly special kind wonderful people.

Review Text:
Even though we didn,t stay overnight at Sport Hotel Hermitage & Spa, our experience using the spa, getting a sports massage, and dining at Tradicio Grill & Koy was absolutely amazing.

From the moment we arrived, we were welcomed with warmth and professionalism, but the real standout of our visit was Elena, the Spa Manager. She went above and beyond to make sure we had the best possible experience, treating us like VIPs. The spa itself is pure relaxation, with top-notch facilities that let us fully unwind. 

The food was just as impressive. Both Tradicio Grill & Koy wowed us with their delicious flavors, beautifully presented dishes, and impeccable service. Every bite was a treat, and we couldn,t have asked for a better dining experience.

Even without staying overnight, this was a perfect luxury getaway. We can only imagine how amazing it must be to stay here, and we,re already looking forward to coming back!
